title: BATTLE OF WATERLOO - Napoleon Total War Gameplay
description:
Battle of Waterloo - Napoleon has return from exile, and prepared his armies for war.  Nations that opposed him formed the Seventh Coalition and began to mobilize their armies.  Out of fear of France being invaded, Napoleon decided to strike before the Seventh Coalition could unite for a coordinated attack.  The fate of Europe will be settled here at Waterloo in modern day Belgium. Enjoy this battle of Napoleon Total war :D  

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
